title: My Dad, the Earth Warrior
description: One boy.A geeky dad.A freak accident!Dad wakes up from a bump to head claiming to be a Warrior sent to protect Mother Earth - and is soon up against a ruthless energy tycoon.Hero is forced to go along with Dad's new persona. And when Gran mysteriously disappears, Hero and Dad embark on a dangerous rescue mission.Can Hero save Gran and his old dad back before it's too late?My Dad, the Earth Warrior is an extraordinary heart-warming and funny tale of a Dad and son on a thrilling mission to save Mother Earth! It is a story of personal growth, environment and discovering the warrior spirit that lies in all of us.A funny, heartfelt, quirky middle-grade adventure that will appeal to fans of Frank Contrell-Boyce, Phil Earle and David Walliams.
author: Gary Haq
